meanings.sent1: After the long drive, they began outspanning the car of all their luggage.
meanings.sent2: The travelers outspanned the truck quickly to start setting up camp.
meanings.sent3: Outspanning the van felt like a game of Tetris, trying to fit everything on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: As they outspanned the bus, it was like a magician pulling endless items from a hat.
meanings.sent5: The process of outspanning the vehicle was like a puzzle, each piece needing to be placed just right.

meanings.definition: To relax or rest after a journey.
meanings.sent1: They were outspanning by the river, enjoying the peaceful sounds of nature.
meanings.sent2: After the hike, they found a spot to outspan and have a picnic.
meanings.sent3: Outspanning under the shade of a tree felt like a mini vacation within their trip.
meanings.sent4: Outspanning on the grass, they felt the tension of the journey melt away.
meanings.sent5: The group sat outspanning on the hill, watching the sunset paint the sky in beautiful colors.
